Please use <a href="../tf/quantization/quantize"><code>tf.quantization.quantize</code></a> instead.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/quantize_v2"><code>tf.compat.v1.quantize_v2</code></a>


``` python
tf.quantize_v2(
    input,
    min_range,
    max_range,
    T,
    mode='MIN_COMBINED',
    name=None,
    round_mode='HALF_AWAY_FROM_ZERO'
)
```
